channel.title: Projects - See More on Github! on Introduction
channel.description: Recent content in Projects - See More on Github! on Introduction

item.title: Connect4 AI - Java
item.description: Connect-4 with AI and Graphical User Interface This is a Connect-4 AI written in Java and implementing a Minimax Algorithm with Alpha-Beta Pruning. With difficulty = 4 and under 100,000 distinct games, this AI beats a random AI 99.983% of the time and loses 0.013% of the time.

item.title: Qt Sidescroller - C++
item.description: Alien Invasion This is a Sidescroller written in C++ using the Qt Creator and an Event-Driven Programming Scheme. This Project was completed in collaboration with Darren Atallah, Weiyu Huang, and Peter Liu. Among other things, I was responsible for handling user input, player abilities, and optimizing program efficiency.
